tissue module

class tissue.Tissue(omega, alpha, generation_time)

Bases: object

Conceptual class that represents tissue where cells are.

Parameters

  • omega (double) – percentage of cancerous cells in the whole population at which the tumor can be detected

  • alpha (double) – treatment factor between 0 and 1 that decreases at each iteration the fitness of a cancerous cell that receives the treatment

  • generation_time (int) – number of iterations the treatment is effective on a cancerous cell

get_apoptose(weighted=True)
initial_population(N=1000, prop_cancer=0.01, init_clones=3)

Constructor method

reproduce(weighted=True)
stats()

Compute some statistics about the cell population.

Returns

a tuple with statistics for each time step : total number of cells (remains constant btw), number of cancerous cells, number of clone types, and average fitness

Return type

tuple
